marytts.tools.voiceimport
Class DurationCARTTrainer

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.voiceimport.VoiceImportComponent
      marytts.tools.voiceimport.DurationCARTTrainer

public class DurationCARTTrainer
extends VoiceImportComponent

A class which converts a text file in festvox format into a one-file-per-utterance format in a given directory.

Author:
schroed
